Desc.eng: Errr... Who are you? Why are you here? Eheh... just joking. So what is the correct number, please?
That is the correct answer, obviously. Why are you still here?
I want my reward now, please. Tell me the trick.

The what? Oh yes, of course! Set gear ratio to 1:324 at Control Station 542 so the reality-changing energies will dissipate faster when you destroy the Relic, which will result in a lot less death and destruction in Borgovia!
I'll try no to forget these numbers and ratios. Thank you.
What? What are you doing here?! Go away and don't bother me anymore!
